channel.title: OSINT on 7Rocky's Blog. Cybersecurity and Maths

item.title: Block Hunt3r
item.description: We are told that someone has been uploading images to Görli testnet (an Ethereum Blockchain) between 2020-07-30 and 2020-08-01. We need to find one image that contains the flag. To interact with Görli we need to go to https://goerli.etherscan.io. We can find the range of block numbers within the dates specified manually going to https://goerli.etherscan.io/blocks/<number>. Poking around with the website, we find that https://goerli.etherscan.io/block/3134050 is the first block of the range and https://goerli.
